title: Theresa May – 2003 Speech at Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Theresa May, the then Chair of the Conservative Party, at the party’s conference held in Blackpool on 6 October 2003.
content:
This is the most important conference we have held in a decade. As we meet here in Blackpool, the eyes of the country are upon us. People are starting to look for a new government and they want to know if we can do the job.
